import React from "react";
 
import {includes} from "lodash";
import {cx} from "emotion";
 
import PropTypes from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
import {createIcon} from "./icon";
 
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
 
import getListviewLabelContainerStyle from "../styles/listview/listview-label-container.style";
import getListviewLabelStyle from "../styles/listview/listview-label.style";
import getStackedLabelContainer from "../styles/listview/listview-stacked-label-container.style";
import getListviewLabelVariationStyle from "../styles/listview/listview-label-variation.style";
import getListviewThumbStyle from "../styles/listview/listview-thumbnail.style";
import getListviewItemStyle from "../styles/listview/listview-item.style";
import getListviewIconRightStyle from "../styles/listview/listview-icon-right.style";
 
import {IconAngleRight} from "./icons";
 
const thumbSizes = [
  "mini",
  "tiny",
  "small",
  "medium",
  "large",
  "big",
  "huge",
  "label",
];
 
export function ListviewItem({
  component,
  children,
  icon,
  thumbnail,
  href,
  thumbSize,
  thumbContained,
  thumbBorder,
  thumbRounded,
  thumbAlt,
  onClick,
  label,
  labelRight,
  active,
  disabled,
  labelIcon,
  labelEllipsis,
  labelVariation,
  uniformLabels,
  labelProps,
  basicLabel,
  heading,
  text,
  headingComponent,
  iconProps,
  iconRight,
  stackLabels,
  inverted,
  flush,
  variation,
  borderless,
  item,
  ...otherProps
}) {
 
  let labelContentLeft;
  let labelContentRight;
  let thumbContent;
  let iconRightContent;
 
  const className = "cm-listview-item item";
  let content = children;
  children = React.Children.toArray(children);
 
  if (disabled) {
    href = undefined;
    onClick = undefined;
  }
  else Iif (onClick && href === undefined) {
    href = "#";
  }
 
  const styleFlags = { stackLabels, active, disabled, inverted, borderless };
 
  // const classSet = {
  //   active,
  //   disabled,
  // };
 
 
 
  if (label) {
    const labelStyleFlags = [];
    let labelClass = "label cm-listview-label";
 
    Iif (labelIcon) {
      label = <span><i aria-hidden="true" className="icon">{createIcon(labelIcon)}</i> {label}</span>;
    }
 
    if (labelEllipsis) { labelStyleFlags.push("ellipsis"); }
    if (basicLabel) { labelStyleFlags.push("basic"); }
    if (labelRight) { labelStyleFlags.push("right"); }
    if (uniformLabels) { labelStyleFlags.push("uniform"); }
    Iif (stackLabels) { labelStyleFlags.push("stackLabels"); }
 
    labelClass = cx(labelClass,getListviewLabelStyle(labelStyleFlags));
    Iif (labelVariation) {
      labelClass = cx(labelClass,getListviewLabelVariationStyle(labelStyleFlags,labelVariation));
    }
 
    labelProps = mergeProps({className: labelClass,children: label},labelProps);
 
    const labelElement = React.createElement("span",labelProps,label);
 
    const labelContainerClass = cx("cm-listview-label-container",getListviewLabelContainerStyle(labelStyleFlags));
 
    const labelContainerElement = React.createElement("div",{className: labelContainerClass, key: "label"},labelElement);
 
    if (labelRight) {
      labelContentRight = labelContainerElement;
    }
    else {
      labelContentLeft = labelContainerElement;
    }
  }
 
  if (!content || (typeof children[0] === "string")) {
    content = [];
    if (heading) {
      content.push(React.createElement(headingComponent,{key: "heading"},heading));
      Eif (text) {
        content.push(<p key="text">{text}</p>);
      }
      Iif (children.length) {
        content.push(<div key="content">{children}</div>);
      }
    }
    else if (children.length) {
      content = children;
    }
    else {
      content = text || "-";
    }
  }
 
  if (thumbnail || icon) {
    let thumb;
    let thumbClass = "thumb";
    const thumbStyleFlags = [];
 
    if (thumbContained) { thumbStyleFlags.push("contained"); }
    if (thumbBorder) { thumbStyleFlags.push("bordered"); }
    Eif (thumbRounded || thumbRounded == null) { thumbStyleFlags.push("rounded"); }
 
    if (thumbSize && includes(thumbSizes,thumbSize)) {
      thumbStyleFlags.push(thumbSize);
    }
 
    if (thumbnail) {
      Eif (!thumbAlt) { thumbAlt = heading || text || ""; }
      Iif (thumbSize === "label") {
        thumb = <img src={thumbnail} alt={thumbAlt} />;
      }
      else {
        thumb = <aek-img style={{backgroundImage: `url(${thumbnail})`}} alt={thumbAlt} />;
      }
    }
    else { // is icon
      iconProps = mergeProps({className: "icon"},iconProps);
      thumb = <i aria-hidden="true" {...iconProps}>{createIcon(icon)}</i>;
    }
 
    thumbClass = cx(thumbClass,getListviewThumbStyle(thumbStyleFlags));
 
    thumbContent = React.createElement("div",{className: thumbClass, key: "thumb"},thumb);
  }
 
  if (iconRight === undefined && (href || onClick)) {
    iconRight = IconAngleRight;
  }
 
  if (iconRight) {
    iconRightContent = (
      <div className={getListviewIconRightStyle(styleFlags,variation)} key="iconRight">{createIcon(iconRight)}</div>
    );
  }
 
  const itemWrapperComponent = href ? "a" : "div";
 
  const itemWrapperProps = {
    className: "cm-listview-item-wrapper",
    href,
    onClick,
  };
 
  let labelAndContent = [
    labelContentLeft,
    <div key="content">{content}</div> ,
  ];
 
  Iif (stackLabels) {
    labelAndContent = (
      <div key="stackedLabelAndContent" className={getStackedLabelContainer(styleFlags,variation)}>{labelAndContent}</div>
    );
  }
 
  const itemWrapperElement = React.createElement(itemWrapperComponent,itemWrapperProps,[
    thumbContent,
    labelAndContent,
    labelContentRight,
    iconRightContent,
  ]);
 
  otherProps = mergeProps({className: cx(className,getListviewItemStyle(styleFlags,variation))},otherProps);
 
  return React.createElement(component,otherProps,itemWrapperElement);
 
}
 
ListviewItem.propTypes = {
  component: PropTypes.any,
  headingComponent: PropTypes.any,
  labelProps: PropTypes.object,
  onClick: PropTypes.func,
  children: PropTypes.any,
  icon: PropTypes.icon,
  thumbnail: PropTypes.string,
  href: PropTypes.string,
  thumbSize: PropTypes.string,
  thumbContained: PropTypes.bool,
  thumbBorder: PropTypes.bool,
  thumbRounded: PropTypes.bool,
  thumbAlt: PropTypes.string,
  label: PropTypes.string,
  labelRight: PropTypes.bool,
  active: PropTypes.bool,
  disabled: PropTypes.bool,
  labelIcon: PropTypes.icon,
  labelEllipsis: PropTypes.bool,
  labelVariation: PropTypes.variation,
  uniformLabels: PropTypes.bool,
  basicLabel: PropTypes.bool,
  heading: PropTypes.string,
  text: PropTypes.string,
  iconProps: PropTypes.object,
  iconRight: PropTypes.icon,
  stackLabels: PropTypes.bool,
};
 
ListviewItem.defaultProps = {
  component: "li",
  headingComponent: "h4",
};
